name: Branching Out (Thorin1904)
description:
Branching Out is a game where the player takes on the role of a tree, growing and thriving in different environments. The player must use cards to represent different elements such as water, sunlight, worshipper, and magic to help the tree grow and survive against environmental threats such as corruption, tribal creatures, witchs, volcanoes and diseases.

The game has been made with Unity Engine in 2023 Global Game Jam, just in 48 hours. Since theme was about roots,  We have decided the genre as "isometric card-puzzle"

Due to limited time, some of the mechanics are not implemented in the game yet. We hope to develop other features in game in a short time.

If you like the game, we are waiting for your valuable feedbacks.

Our team members:

Gökay Akçay / Unity Developer

Batuhan Turan / Unity Developer

Gökay Tacal / 2D-Pixel Artist

İlhan Kara / 2D-Pixel Artist

Yusuf Kızılkaya / Sound Designer
